docs.snippet: The steamship Elbruz, which arrived yesterday from Flushing, Belgium, brought the crew of a Gloucester fisherman, the Gracie C, Young, which had undergone a severe experience during the raging December gale of the last few days....
docs.lead_paragraph: The steamship Elbruz, which arrived yesterday from Flushing, Belgium, brought the crew of a Gloucester fisherman, the Gracie C, Young, which had undergone a severe experience during the raging December gale of the last few days.

headline.main: A BATTLE FOR LIFE.; THE NARROW ESCAPE OF THE CREW OF THE GRACIE C. YOUNG.

docs.snippet: PHILADELPHIA, Nov. 27. -- The steamship Pennsylvania arrived at her dock to-day and reported that the British steamer Falcon, from New-York for Glasgow, with a cargo of staves, was abandoned on the 16th inst., in a sinking condition, with bow stov...
docs.lead_paragraph: PHILADELPHIA, Nov. 27. -- The steamship Pennsylvania arrived at her dock to-day and reported that the British steamer Falcon, from New-York for Glasgow, with a cargo of staves, was abandoned on the 16th inst., in a sinking condition, with bow stove and bulwarks and sails gone. The Captain and crew were taken on board by the Pennsylvania and landed here.

headline.main: THE STEAMSHIP FALCON LOST.; BUT THE CAPTAIN AND CREW WERE RESCUED JUST IN TIME.

docs.abstract: Vizcaya-Cornelius Hargrave Collision; Seventy Drowned Off Barnegat

headline.main: A FATAL CRASH NEAR PORT; MANY LIVES LOST IN A COLLISION OFF BARNEGAT. A SCHOONER CUTS DOWN A PASSENGER STEAMER. THE CORNELIUS HARGRAVE RUNS INTO THE SPANISH LINER VIZCAYA, SINKS HER, AND GOES TO THE BOTTOM HERSELF -- SOME OF THE PEOPLE RESCUED -- AWFUL SUFFERINGS OF THE SURVIVORS.

docs.snippet: BOSTON, Oct. 30. -- Private advices awaken new hopes that the crew of the Boston ship Magellan, which was wrecked on the night of Aug. 6 by collision wJtll the new Bath snip St. Mary, off Cape Horn, may have been saved. The ship James Drummond, Ca...
docs.lead_paragraph: BOSTON, Oct. 30. -- Private advices awaken new hopes that the crew of the Boston ship Magellan, which was wrecked on the night of Aug. 6 by collision wJtll the new Bath snip St. Mary, off Cape Horn, may have been saved. The ship James Drummond, Capt. Curtis, which arrived at San Francisco Oct. 5 from Philadelphia, furnishes the following report:

headline.main: HOPE FOR THE MAGELLAN'S CREW.; THE WRECK SIGHTED A MONTH AFTER THE COLLISION WITH THE ST. MARY.
A FIRE ON THE MAJESTIC.; COTTON BALES STOWED IN THE HOLD CAUSE A DANGEROUS BLAZE.

docs.snippet: CHICAGO, Nov. 28.--The students' life saving crew of the Northwestern University, at Evanston, have again covered themselves with glory....

docs.snippet: YOKOHAMA, Nov. 7.--The American ship Cheseborough, Capt. Ericsson, from Hiogo via Hokadadi for New-York, has been wrecked on the northwest coast of Japan. Nineteen of her crew were drowned....
docs.lead_paragraph: YOKOHAMA, Nov. 7.--The American ship Cheseborough, Capt. Ericsson, from Hiogo via Hokadadi for New-York, has been wrecked on the northwest coast of Japan. Nineteen of her crew were drowned.

headline.main: WRECKED OFF THE JAPAN COAST.; NINETEEN OF THE CREW OF AN AMERICAN SHIP LOST.
